entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
